title: Haas to host first John E. Martin Mental Healthcare Tech Challenge
author: Kim Girard
excerpt:
For Michael Martin, MBA 09, teaming up with Berkeley Haas to launch the 2020 John E. Martin Mental Healthcare Tech Challenge was deeply personal. The challenge is named for his father, a Vietnam veteran who in his later years counseled veterans returning from Iraq and Afghanistan. It was Martin’s father’s commitment to improving the quality […]
